tasks.task: Drive a four wheel drive truck.
subtasks: Sit in the driver's seat.
Insert key into ignition and start the truck.
Press accelerator pedal to move forward.
Use steering wheel to turn the vehicle.
Use brakes to stop the vehicle.

tasks.task: Operate a balancer machine in a shed.
subtasks: Enter a shed or building.
Approach the balancer machine.
Lift the trailing edge of a round hay bale using levers or hydraulics.
Rotate the bale to check balance.
Adjust weights or straps to balance the bale.
Repeat for multiple bales.

tasks.task: Load a baler with hay.
subtasks: Approach a hay field or storage area.
Use a pitchfork to gather hay into a pile.
Approach the baler machine.
Feed hay into the hopper by hand.
Monitor the bale formation process.
Exit the baler when full.

tasks.task: Unwind twine from a bale.
subtasks: Locate a bale with twine.
Grasp the twine with one hand.
Use the other hand to untwist the twine.
Carefully remove the twine from the bale, avoiding injuring oneself.

tasks.task: Insert a thumb into hay to check maturity.
subtasks: Approach a bale or stack of hay.
Locate a handful of hay.
Insert thumb into the hay clump.
Squeeze or feel the hay maturity.
Remove thumb and evaluate.

tasks.task: Repair a hydraulics system.
subtasks: Identify a hydraulic leak or issue.
Disassemble the hydraulic component to inspect.
Apply sealant or replacement parts.
Reassemble the hydraulic system.
Test functionality.

tasks.task: Remove and replace a chain.
subtasks: Locate a broken or damaged chain.
Dismantle the area where the chain is attached.
Slide the new chain into place.
Secure the chain ends properly.

tasks.task: Clean equipment and tools.
subtasks: Gather cleaning materials.
Examine the equipment for dirt or debris.
Use brushes or cloths to wipe down surfaces.
Check for lubrication needs.
Apply appropriate lubricants.

tasks.task: Sink fence posts.
subtasks: Approach the area where fence posts need sinking.
Use a sledgehammer or post driver.
Position the fence post in the ground.
Strike the post into the ground repeatedly until secure.
Stab the post with the sledgehammer to set it.

tasks.task: Connect wire to a fence.
subtasks: Hold the wire tightly.
Use pliers or a fence clip to attach the wire to the fence post.
Tighten the connection to prevent slack.
Check multiple connections along the fence line.

tasks.task: Stack bales in a storage area.
subtasks: Position the bale transport vehicle (e.g., forklift) near the storage area.
Lower the forks so the bales can be placed.
Position the bale onto the fork.
Drive the vehicle to the stacking location.
Lower the bale onto the ground or pallet.
Repeat until the area is filled appropriately.

tasks.task: Use a chain to guide livestock.
subtasks: Position the chain in a straight path.
Direct the livestock to follow the chain.
Maintain control over the animals by tightening or loosening the chain.

tasks.task: Cut hose couplings.
subtasks: Locate a hose with damaged coupling.
Apply cutting tool around the part where the coupling needs to be removed.
Separate the connector sections.

tasks.task: Check a gas gauge.
subtasks: Approach a machine with a gas tank (e.g., truck).

Securely fasten a lid on a bale.
Hang hay bales on a rack.
Break apart a bale.
Apply sunscreen to prevent sunburn.
Chew rags (hypothetical, possible mistake in transcription?).
Plan how to set up stalls for pigs, but given as "planned stall for pigs" in the original transcript.
Brush the hair of a horse.
Entertain visitors at an agritourism event.
subtasks: Interact with farm animals if safe and applicable.
